description:
Faced with tough decisions, Yuma decides to run away from his problems and search for his father until Master Roku confronts him and forces him to face a few hard truths!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Forked Paths of Destiny! Yuma Throws Away Dueling!
Unmei no Wakaremichi! Duel o Suteta Yuuma!
運命の分かれ道! デュエルを捨てた遊馬!
